name: 4chan - Yotsuba Clean
description:
Highly customizable, cleaned up Yotsuba with transparent and rounded reply boxes.

Works better with 4chan X.

Yotsuba B Version: https://userstyles.org/styles/127395/

Additional BGs: http://imgur.com/a/NLeqq
PM if you have requests, I will make if possible.
additional_info:
6/11/16
-Changed Default BG's aspect ratio from a 16:10 to 16:9 for a better fit on most screens

5/3/16
-removed excessive clutter from the top of the board.  

5/2/16 
-Release
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Customizable elements(instructions provided above the code):
- Background
- Reply Box Color
- OP box color
- Text Color
- Name Color
- Greentext/quote Color
- Backlink Color
- Transparency for most elements

 I've provided which areas you need to change in case you want to. 

Based on ksgu's design but more near the original board design and more user friendly.
ksgu's version: https://userstyles.org/styles/125530/
